Name: Copernicus Global Land Cover Service Dynamic Land Cover
Classes Legend: Forest, Shrubland, Herbaceous Vegetation, Herbaceous Wetland, Moss And Lichen, Bare/Sparse Vegetation, Cropland, Urban/Built-Up, Snow And Ice, Permanent Water Bodies

Name: Google Dynamic World V1
Classes Legend: Water, Trees, Grass, Flooded Vegetation, Crops, Shrub and Scrub, Built, Bare, Snow and Ice

Name: ESRI-10m Annual LULC
Provider: Environmental Systems Research Institute (ESRI), Impact Observatory, and Microsoft Maps for Good Initiative
Reference System: [{'epsg_code': 'EPSG:32600', 'hemisphere': 'North', 'description': 'UTM zones for Northern Hemisphere', 'coverage': 'Areas north of the equator', 'usage_context': 'Northern hemisphere regions'}, {'epsg_code': 'EPSG:32700', 'hemisphere': 'South', 'description': 'UTM zones for Southern Hemisphere', 'coverage': 'Areas south of the equator', 'usage_context': 'Southern hemisphere regions'}]

Name: Global LULC change 2000 and 2020
Provider: University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory
Classes Legend: Terra Firma Vegetation Cover, Wetland, Open Surface Water, Snow/Ice, Cropland, Built-Up And Ocean

Name: Global Pasture Watch (GPW)
Classes Legend: Cultivated Grassland (CG), Natural/Semi-Natural Grassland (NSG), Other Land Cover (OLC)

Name: South America Soybean Maps
Provider: University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory

Name: WorldCover 10m 2021
Classes Legend: Tree Cover, Shrubland, Grassland, Cropland, Built-Up, Bare/Sparse Vegetation, Snow and Ice, Permanent Water Bodies, Herbaceous Wetland, Mangroves, Moss, Lichen

Name: WorldCereal
Classes Legend: Temporary (One-Year Cycle) Crops, Winter Cereals, Spring Cereals, Maize Season Maize And Second Season Maize

Name: PRODES Deforestation, Warnings and Vegetation for Brazilian Biomes
Source: IRS, Sentinel-2 MSI, Landsat series, CBERS-4/4A
Classes Legend: Deforestation In The Year, Residual In The Year, Hydrography, Non-Forest (Only For Legal Amazon), Natural Vegetation/Forest

Name: DETER Deforestation, Warnings and Vegetation for Brazilian Biomes
Classification Method: Visual Interpretation and Spectral Mixture Model
Classes Legend: Deforestation (With Bare Soil, Vegetation and Mining), Degradation (Degradation, Wildfire Scar), Logging (Selective Cut Type 1 - Disordered And Selective Cut Type 2 - Geometric)

Name: TerraClass Amazonia
Provider: National Institute for Space Research (INPE) and Brazilian Agricultural Research Corporation (Embrapa)
Classification Method: Visual Interpretation, Supervised Bhattacharya Classification, and Deep Learning
Classes Legend: Primary Natural Forest Vegetation, Secondary Natural Forest Vegetation, Forestry, Shrub/Arboreal Pasture, Herbaceous Pasture, Perennial Agricultural Crops, Semi-Perennial Agricultural Crops, Temporary Agricultural Crops Of 1 Cycle, Temporary Agricultural Crops Of More Than 1 Cycle, Temporary Agricultural Crops, Mining, Urbanized, Other Uses, Not Observed, Deforestation In The Year, Non-Forest, Natural Non-Forest, Body Of Water

Name: TerraClass Cerrado
Provider: National Institute for Space Research (INPE) and Brazilian Agricultural Research Corporation (Embrapa)
Classification Method: Visual Interpretation, Supervised Bhattacharya Classification, and Deep Learning
Classes Legend: Primary Natural Forest Vegetation, Secondary Natural Forest Vegetation, Forestry, Pasture, Perennial Agricultural Crops, Semi-Perennial Agricultural Crops, Temporary Agricultural Crops Of 1 Cycle, Temporary Agricultural Crops Of More Than 1 Cycle, Mining, Urbanized, Other Built Areas, Other Uses, Not Observed, Deforestation In The Year, Body Of Water

Name: MapBiomas
Provider: Non-governmental Organizations (NGO's), Universities and Technology Companies
Classification Method: Supervised Random Forest and Deep Learning
Classes Legend: Forest, Non-Forest Natural Formation, Farming, Non-Vegetated Area, Water And Not Observed, And More

Name: IBGE Monitoring Land Cover and Land Use
Provider: Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE)
Classes Legend: Artificial Area, Cropland, Managed Pasture, Mosaic Of Uses In Forest Area, Forestry, Forest Vegetation, Wetland, Grassland Vegetation, Mosaic Of Uses In Grassland, Inland Water Body, Coastal Water Body, Bare Area

Name: National Supply Company Agricultural Mapping
Source: MODIS, Sentinel-2 MSI, and Landsat series
Classification Method: Machine Learning, Statistical Methods, Visual Interpretation
Classes Legend: Cotton, irrigated rice, coffee, sugarcane, corn, soybean, others Summer and Winter crops (peanut, oat, canola, rye, barley, beans, sesame, sunflower, castor bean, sorghum, wheat, and triticale), and sugarcane mill
